description: Delivered end-to-end web applications for multiple clients, including contract management systems, admin dashboards, tourism platforms, and WordPress e-commerce solutions. Handled system architecture, API integration, and deployment.

Provided IT technical support while also designing, developing, and deploying internal web applications. Responsible for system troubleshooting, infrastructure support, and full-stack web development to support internal operational workflows.

Developed, supported, and optimized Hospital Information Systems (SIMRS). Built internal applications including chatbot for patient registration and medication stock opname. Managed hospital IT infrastructure, network installation, troubleshooting, and IT asset management in a mission-critical healthcare environment.

Managed and maintained computer lab infrastructure. Provided IT support for academic and administrative systems. Developed hands-on IT learning modules and taught basic IT and application usage to students.
Diagnosed and repaired hardware and software issues, installed operating systems and applications, assembled custom desktop PCs, and provided technical support and recommendations to customers.
